availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Conrad Baumberger (Swiss Consul, cigar maker)

body.p: Cigar maker in Jefferson County, Kentucky. Dubendorf, Switzerland native. Married to Mary Baumberger. Father of Julia Baumberger, Cora Baumberger, and J. C. Baumberger. Served as Swiss Consul for Kentucky and Tennessee.

bibl.p: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 8, p. 25. Kentucky, Death Records, 1852-1964, Ancestry, Jefferson County, 1908. “John C. Baumberger Dies at Seventy-Six,” Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), April 28, 1908, p. 2.
